sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
#app
    router-link.button(to="dakaed") {{ daka.button }}
    
    .menu 
        .line1
        .line2
        .line3
</template>

<script>
export default {
//   el: "#app",
    data() {
        return {
            daka: {
                button: '打卡',
                note:'勇威，昨晚睡得好嗎？'
            },
        };
    },
}
</script>

<style lang="sass">
#app
*
    // border: solid 1px
    position: relative
    font-family: Times, 微軟正黑體
    width: 100%
    height: 100%
    margin: 0
body
    background-color: #333333
    //z-index: 1
    position: relative
    width: 100%
    height: 100%

// .daka
//   position: relative
//   // top: 100px
//   margin: 0px auto

.button
    position: absolute
    font-weight: bold
    width: 100px
    height: 100px
    border-radius: 100%
    // display: inline-block
    // justify-content: center
    // vertical-align: middle
    left: 50% 
    // margin: auto
    margin-left: -50px 
    margin-top: -50px
    line-height: 100px
    text-align: center
    color: #ffffff
    background-color: #A78E70
    // float: left
    top: 50%
    // margin-top: 170px
    cursor: pointer

.daka-enter-active, .daka-leave-active
    transition: 1.5s
.daka-enter, .daka-leave-to
    opacity: 0


.note
    position: absolute
    text-align: center
    display: inline
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    color: #ffffff
    float: left
    width: 300px
    height: 100px
    margin-top: 85px
    margin-left: -150px




.menu
    position: absolute
    top: 20%
    left: 20%
    width: 50px 
    height: 50px
    background-color: #A78E70
    // display: block
    margin-top: -25px 
    margin-left: -25px
    .line1
        position: relative
        // margin: auto
        background-color: #ffffff
        width: 30px
        height: 3.5px
        top: 30%
        left: 50%
        margin-left: -15px
        margin-top: -1.75px

    .line2
        //border: solid 1px
        position: relative
        padding: 0
        border: 0
        margin: auto
        // margin: auto
        background-color: #ffffff
        width: 30px
        height: 3.5px
        top: 46%
        left: 50%
        margin-left: -15px
        margin-top: -1.75px

    .line3
        //border: solid 1px
        margin: auto
        width: 30px
        height: 3.5px
        position: relative
        background-color: #ffffff
        top: 60%
        left: 50%
        margin-left: -15px
        margin-top: -1.75px

</style>
